mapper.select: select st.message.*, nvl(to_char(msg_receive_date), '읽지않음') as msg_receive_date_str from st.message where msg_receiver = #{value} order by msg_seq desc
mapper.update: update st.message set msg_receive_date=(SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL) where msg_seq=#{value}
mapper.select: select max(msg_seq) from st.message where msg_sender=#{id} order by msg_seq desc
